name: FarmTrack
description: Real-time vehicle tracking for the agricultural industry, providing high quality business analytics at an affordable price.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Mosaic Poster
description: An Aurelia application built using Webpack and Leaflet for exploring the movie poster for the upcoming Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles movie.

name: Strengthen
description: The best way to track your movements and work with your trainer. Created by @TylerJPresley

name: Datagrid
description: Proof-of-concept of an Aurelia datagrid that supports sorting, searching and custom rendering. Created by @RomkeVdMeulen

name: Sentry
description: A dual-shell skeleton for handling a login screen. Created by @MatthewJames

name: GistRun
description: GistRun was created by Aurelia core team member Jeremy Danyow, it runs and edits GitHub Gists (surprise). GistRun is built with Aurelia, uses the GitHub API and is hosted on GitHub pages. CloudFlare provides DNS and Heroku hosts GistRun's integration with GitHub's OAuth web application flow.

name: Aurelia Hub
description: The HUB is a place where Aurelia developers will come to learn, research, interact and gain access to all they need to be successful while building applications on the Aurelia platform. The hub itself is built on the Aurelia CLI (just like this site), however the source code is not currently public.

name: Pokego.run
description: Pokego.run is a Pokemon spotting map where you can record Pokemon sightings for others to discover.

name: Bouncer
description: An out-of-the-box list filter value converter for Aurelia. Bouncer makes it easy to hook up controls to filter any list in Aurelia. Created by @MatthewJames

name: Aurelia Orm
description: Aurelia Orm makes working with RESTful API's a breeze with features including; Entity definitions, Repositories, Associations, Validation and lots more.

name: Kchomp
description: Kchomp is an all in one content aggregator application built with Aurelia.

name: Markdown Editor
description: A fully-featured Markdown Editor built using Aurelia in a few short hours. It is built as an example for Aurelia book author Dwayne Charrington's upcoming book Aurelia For Real World Web Applications in which you build this application and get the source code for it.

name: Aurelia Form
description: Leverage Aurelia's strengths, and create a standardized way of describing forms simply using objects and arrays.

name: Aurelia Auth
description: Aurelia Auth is a plugin for adding in authentication to your Aurelia applications.

name: Aurelia Materialize Bridge
description: Use Materialize components in your Aurelia application without writing any wrapper code. Powerful binding expressions directly in your markup

name: Aurelia Syncfusion Bridge
description: A set of Aurelia wrappers for Syncfusion Essential Studio for JavaScript.

name: Aurelia Leaflet
description: An Aurelia plugin for adding Leaflet maps into your Aurelia applications.

name: Aurelia Kendo UI Bridge
description: A set of Aurelia wrappers for Kendo UI.
